name: Evil Bunny
description:
Evil Bunny

As an evil bunny, you don't like the grind of friendship.

Suddenly as two worlds collide, purple rifts unleash powerful weapons never before seen by bunny kind!

Nobody knows how to them, some say there are instruction manuals that show how to use these weapons properly.

You're on a quest to get these books and nobody is going to stop you!

Features and Instructions: Befriend Bunnies  Use the bunnies you befriend in tests to gain research points!  An eyewatering amount of upgrades to obtain. Wage attacks on the world when you have enough Attack and Defence for their Manuals  Conquer the world when you obtain all 5 books and win the game.

Warning: This is game is abit of a grind.

Controls:

Use a mouse, or the equivalent.

Help Resolution

Play on fullscreen/full resolution for best experience 

WARNING: Known issues at other resolutions
